detaileddescription.para: Symbol duration in microseconds (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The number of symbols per octets for the current PHY (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
Preamble field length in symbols (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
SFD field length in symbols (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The maximum PSDU size (in octets) the PHY shall be able to receive.
RX-to-TX or TX-to-RX maximum turnaround time (in symbol periods).
The maximum number of symbols in a frame (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The duration of the synchronization header (SHR) in symbols for the current PHY (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
The number of symbols per octets for the current PHY (2450 MHz O-QPSK).
Channels supported - only 2.4GHz O-QPSK page 0 supported so one entry in array.
Size of frame control in octets.
Convenient way of checking if MAC command or data.
Convenient way of checking if MAC command.

briefdescription.para: Mask for checking frame pending processing based on ack. requested and being a MAC command frame.
Mask for checking ack. sending based on ack. requested and being a MAC command or data frame.

detaileddescription.para: Note - arbitrary number and could make it easy by sending all beacons using beacon notify indication.
Note - can't have more than 16 for 2.4GHz.
Maximum PIB enumeration from all PIB attribute enums.
FCTL(2) + Seq(1) + SPID(2) + SADR(8) + SS(2) + GTS(1) + Pending(1) + beacon payload
FCTL(2) + SEQ(1) + DPID(dpidl) + DADR(dadrl) + SPID(spidl) + SADR(sadrl) + 1
The number of symbols forming a superframe slot when the superframe order is equal to 0.
The number of symbols forming a superframe when the superframe order is equal to 0.
The number of superframes in which a GTS descriptor exists in the beacon frame of the PAN coordinator.
The maximum number of octets added by the MAC sublayer to the MAC payload of a beacon frame.
The number of consecutive lost beacons that will cause the MAC sublayer of a receiving device to declare a loss of synchronization.
The maximum number of octets added by the MAC sublayer to the PSDU without security.
The maximum size of an MPDU, in octets, that can be followed by a SIFS period.

The minimum number of symbols forming the CAP. This ensures that MAC commands can still be transferred to devices when GTSs are being used. An exception to this minimum shall be allowed for the accommodation of the temporary increase in the beacon frame length needed to perform GTS maintenance.
The minimum number of octets added by the MAC sublayer to the PSDU.
The number of slots contained in any superframe.
The number of symbols forming the basic time period used by the CSMA-CA algorithm. TBD
Maximum frame total wait time minimum
Maximum frame total wait time default
Maximum frame total wait time maximum

memberdef.name: MAC_154_PIB_RESPONSE_WAIT_TIME_DEF
memberdef.initializer: ((uint32_t)1000000/16) /* Test - make much larger due to test harness response */

detaileddescription.para: Security material: Key length in words
Security material: Key length in octets
Security material: Frame counter length in words
Security material: Frame counter length in octets
Security control bits and fields. TBD
Key does not meet key usage policy (0xdc)
Security level does not meet minimum security level (0xdd)
Could not disable transmit or receive (0xe3)
Frame too long after security processing to be sent (0xe5)
Purge request failed to find entry in queue (0xe7)
Parameter is out of range in primitive (0xe8)
Scan failed to find any beacons (0xeA)
No response data after a data request (0xeB)
No allocated short address for operation (0xeC)
Receiver enable request could not be executed as CAP finished (0xed)
PAN ID conflict has been detected (0xee)
Pending transaction has expired and data discarded (0xf0)
Receiver enable request could not be executed as in transmit state (0xf2)
Appropriate key is not available in ACL (0xf3)
Frame does not have valid addresses (0xf5)
Rx enable request longer than beacon interval (0xf6)
Rx enable request cannot be completed (0xf7)
Unable to send aligned beacons as not tracking coordinator (0xf8)
PIB table index out of range (0xf9)
Number of PAN descriptors reached implementation maximum (0xfa)
Set request issued to read-only attribute (0xfb)
Scan already in progress when scan request issued (0xfc)
Unable to to send aligned beacons due to overlap with coordinator (0xfd)
macVsDeviceType - what sort of device this is
Values of frame type in FC.
Device is a coordinator but not a PAN coordinator
